exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
push=(title,url,type1,type2)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: type1,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type2
			}
	});
push("小说🌊分类",null,1,1)
	arList=["都市激情","校园春色","乡村爱情","系统异能","家庭乱伦","穿越重生","经典武侠","同人改编","科学幻想","东方玄幻","娱乐明星","历史架空","西方魔幻","贤者小说"]
	arList.map((tag,index)=>{
		url=`/novel/all?theme=${index+1}&page={{page}}
`;
		push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
			push('最新🌊上架',`/comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=0&category_sub=0&tag=1&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0
`,1,1)

	push('收藏',`/comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=0&category_sub=0&tag=0&sort_field=collect_num&sort_order=2&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0
`,1,0.25)

	push('观看量',`/comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=0&category_sub=0&tag=1&sort_field=view_num&sort_order=2&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`,1,0.25)
	prList=["日本漫画"]
	orList=["短篇","单本","同人"]
		prList.map((teg,ure)=>{
		push(teg,`/comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+1}&category_sub=0&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`,1,1)
	orList.map((tag,index)=>{
		url=`/comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+1}&category_sub=${index}&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`;
		push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
		});

		 mrList=["韩国H漫"]
	arList=["剧情","校园","爱情","BL","奇幻","调教","乱伦"]
	mrList.map((teg,ure)=>{
		push(teg,`/comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+2}&category_sub=0&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`,1,1)
	arList.map((tag,index)=>{
		url=`/comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+2}&category_sub=${index+1}&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page=1&limit=48&tag_id=0`;
		push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
				});
				push('全部🌊视频',`/mv/all?page={{page}}`,1,1)
				push('热门🌊视频',`/mv/hot?page={{page}}`,1,0.35)
push('最近🌊更新',`/mv/new`,1,0.35)
     push('排行榜',`/mv/rank`,1,1)
			krList=[["国产视频","1",0],["日本AV","2",0],["H动漫","3",0],["偷拍自拍","1",1],["次元萝莉","1",2],["国产传媒","1",3],["主播福利","1",4],["吃瓜爆料","1",5],["无码流出","2",1],["高清AV","2",2],["同人热播","3",1],["3D动漫","3",2]]
				krList.map(([teg,ure,p])=>{
		push(teg,`/mv/all?keyword=&title=&actor=0&merchant=&category=${ure}&category_sub=${p}&page_num=1&tag=0&sort_field=id&sort_order=1&limit=48&page={{page}}`,1,0.25)
})
//java.log(JSON.stringify(sort))
JSON.stringify(sort)
</js>

ruleContent.content:
if (baseUrl['match'](/mv/)) { p = result['match'](/data\-url\="(.*)"\s/); p = p ? p[0x1] : 0x1; let name = java['getString']('h1@text'); let intro = java['getString']('.mt-2!0@span.1@text'); let kind = java['getString']('.underline@text'); if (book['durChapterIndex'] == chapter['index']) { b64 = java['base64Encode']('

' + name + '

' + intro + '

' + kind + '

'); dataUrl = 'data:text/html;base64,' + b64; java['startBrowser'](dataUrl, title); java['toast']('正在加载视频 视频加载较慢，请耐心等待'); } '【刷新正文】播放 ✅直链: ' + p; } else { java['getString']('main@html'); }

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if (source.getVariable() == 0) {
    java.toast('当前为小说模式🧾');
    java.getElements('.items-start');
}else if (source.getVariable() == 2) {
	java.toast('当前为视频模式🧾');
    java.getElements('.dx-video-list@li');
}else{
    java.toast('当前为漫画模式🧾');
    java.getElements('.dx-novel-list@li@a');
}
</js>
ruleSearch.name:

  java.getString(".dx-title@textNodes");
} else if (source.getVariable() == 2){
java.getString(".text-default@text");
} else {
   java.getString(".truncate.0@text");
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)) {
	   book.type = 8;
    java.toast('当前为小说模式🧾'); java.getElements('.toggleVolume,ul@.cursor-pointer');
}else if (baseUrl.match(/mv/)) {
	   book.type = 8;
    java.toast('当前为视频模式🧾');
    java.getElements('.cursor-pointer a||ul .text-base3');
}else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)){
	   book.type = 64;
    java.toast('当前为漫画模式🧾');
    java.getElements('.cursor-pointer a||ul .text-base3');
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
name=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}`
author=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}`
kind=`{{book.kind}}`
word=`{{book.wordCount}}`
last=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}`
info = ` 
📖 书名：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}
👤 作者：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}
📜 篇幅：{{@@class.props_box@tag.ul@li.1@text}}
🔖 标签：{{@@class.tag_box@li[0:-3]@a@text##\n}}
🗿 肉量：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.0@text}}
✏  评分：{{@@class.score_box@span@text}}
🕰 最新：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}
👁 观看：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.2@text}}
❤️ 收藏：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.3@text}}
🏷 简介：{{@@class.brief@text##小说简介：}}`;
}else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){
	name=`{{book.name}}`
		author=`{{book.author}}`
		kind=`{{book.kind}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=` 
📖 书名：{{book.name}}
👤 作者：{{book.author}}
🏷 简介：{{book.intro}}`;

	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
		name=`{{$.model.title}}`
		author=`{{$.model.keywords}}`
		kind=`{{$..tags}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=`{{$..brief}}`
		}else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
   name=`{{$.model.title}}`
		author=`{{$.model.authors}}`
		kind=`{{java.getString('.finished')==1?"完结":"连载"}},{{$..categories}}`
		word=``
		last=`{{$..latestUpdate}}`
		info=`{{$..brief}}`
}
data = {
    name: name,
    author: author,
    kind: kind,
    word:word,
    last: last,
    info: info
};

JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: name

ruleContent.content:
if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){ var document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box"); if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) { document.select("div.line"); } else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){ result = "请刷新重试或点开上方章节链接进行验证"; }}else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){ result=java.getString("#content@img@src"); result.split('\n').map(x=>``).join('\n'); }else if(baseUrl.match(/video/)){ if (book['durChapterIndex'] == chapter['index']) { b64 = java['base64Encode'](`

{{$.model.title}}

⌚️ 时长：{{$.model.durationFormat}}

📆 日期：{{$.model.onlineTime##T|.000.*## }}

🎥 播放：{{$.model.viewCount}}次

📩 收藏：{{$.model.collectCount}}

🕵 片商：{{$.model.authors}}

👤 上传：{{$.model.uploader}}

🔖 标签：{{$.model.categories}},{{$.model.tags}}

🏷 简介：{{$.model.brief}}

`); dataUrl = 'data:text/html;base64,' + b64; java['startBrowser'](dataUrl, title); java['toast']('正在加载视频\n视频加载较慢，请耐心等待'); } '【刷新正文】播放\n✅直链:\n' + `{{$.model.url}}`; }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) { java.getString('{$.model.url}') }

 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
'{{getUrl()}}novel/intro?id={{$.id}}'
}else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)) {

	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
'{{getUrl()}}api/video/app/video/intro?force=false&id={{$.id}}&viewId='+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000)
		}else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
'{{getUrl()}}api/audio/app/audio/intro?id={{$.id}}'
}
</js>
ruleSearch.name: $.title

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
	book.type = 8;
 java.toast('当前为小说模式🧾'); 
 var data = [];
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
 }else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)) {
	book.type = 64;
 java.toast('当前为漫画模式🧾'); 
 var data=[]
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
    book.type = 8;
    java.toast('当前为视频模式🧾');
  var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/video/app/video/intro?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$.model.id}')+`&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);

 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data
  }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
    book.type = 32;
    java.toast('当前为听书模式🧾');
    var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/audio/app/audio/chapter?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$..latestReadChapterId}')+`&offset=0&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);
 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data

    
}
 </js>

searchUrl:
<js>
 v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x = v[0];
if (x == 0){
'{{getUrl()}}'+
'api/novel/app/novel/search?category=&excludeTags=&keyword={{key}}&orderType=0&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=40'
}else if (x == 1) {
	'{{getUrl()}}'+'api/comic/app/comic/search?keyword={{key}}&orderType=1&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=40'
	}else if (x == 2 ) {
'{{getUrl()}}'+'api/video/app/video/search?keyword={{key}}&orderType=1&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=40'
		}else if (x == 3 ) {
'{{getUrl()}}'+'api/audio/app/audio/search?category=&keyword={{encodeURIComponent(key)}}&orderType=0&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=42'
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: p.0@a.0@text
ruleBookInfo.name: h1.0@text

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var url = getUrl().replace(/\/$/,'')
//java.log(url)
//处理强制登录
var nn = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
var coks = nn.split('; '); 
ckk = coks.filter(item => !item 
.startsWith("lf_reader_num")).join('; ');
cookie.setCookie(url,ckk);

//自动处理验证
let html = src;

function txt(sr) {
    let text;
    if (src.includes("滑动验证")) {
        let headers = {
             'User-Agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.36",
            "Referer": baseUrl
        };
        try {
            let s = src.match(/src=\"(\/huadong[^"]+)/)[1];
            let sr = java.get(url + s, headers).body()
            eval(sr.match(/(key=\".+?,value=\"[^;]+?\;)/)[1]);
            let va = getval(value);
            let codeul = url + sr.match(/([^"]+yanzheng_huadong\.php[^"]+)/)[1] + `${key}&value=${va}`;
            let ck = java.get(codeul, headers);
            java.log("验证Cookie：" + JSON.stringify(ck.cookies()));
            java.toast("检测到验证,尝试自动处理……");
            let tx = java.ajax(baseUrl);
            html = tx;
            text = java.getString('.read-content@html', tx);
        } catch (error) {
            java.log(error);
            text = "自动验证失败，请重试!";
        }
    } else {
        text = java.getString('.read-content@html', src);
    }
    return text;
}

let text = txt(html);

//处理重新获取文本时可能会出现的错误。
let retryCount = 0;
const maxRetries = 3;
let result;
while (retryCount < maxRetries) {
    if (text != false && text !== "") {
        result = text;
        break;
    } else {
        retryCount++;
        text = txt(html);
        Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(400);
        java.toast(`未获取到文本，正在重试...（当前第${retryCount}次重试）`);
    }
}

if (retryCount === maxRetries) {
    result = "重试三次仍然未获取到文本，请检查网络状况。"
}
result;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: {{@@span.2@text}}
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
if(result.match(/Just a moment/)){
	cookie.removeCookie(baseUrl);
	java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl,"验证");
	result=java.ajax(baseUrl);
}else{
	result=result;
	}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.name: h1@text||h2@text

ruleContent.content:
if(String(java.getString('.manga-picture@source@srcset',src)).match(/\/h2\/avif\//)){ //.avif结尾 result=java.getString('id.pages@tag.a.-2@text') let content = "" let yy = "https://file.acgnngca.com/h2/avif/"+src.match(/(\d+\/\d+\_)/)[1] for(i=0;i<=Number(result);i++){ content+="" } }else if (baseUrl.match(/\/hanime\//)){ //视频 let name= java.getString('h2@text',src) let intro= java.getString('.animation-description@p@text',src) let kond= java.getString('.info@span@text',src) let kind= java.getString('.manga-tags@a@text',src) pi=src.match(/contentUrl\"\:\s\"(.*?)\"\,/) pi = pi?pi[1] : 1; p=String(java.webView(pi,"baseUrl","")).replace(/.*body\>(.*?)\<\/body.*/,'$1') if (book['durChapterIndex'] == chapter['index']) { b64 = java['base64Encode'](`

${name}

${intro}

${kond}

${kind}

ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/\_cos\//)){
p=baseUrl.match(/(\d+)-*\d*.html/)
p=p?p[1]:1
java.log(p)
pi=result.match(/\.\..*\"\>(\d+)\<\\/)
pi=pi?pi[1]:1
pageSum=parseInt(pi)
result=Array.from({length:pageSum-1},
(_,i)=>`https://www.acgmhb.com/ajax_cos/${p}-${i+2}.html?ajax=1`)
}else if(baseUrl.match(/western/)){
java.getString('text.下一页@href')
}else{null}
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
if (baseUrl.match(/webtoon/)){
	java.getElements('ul@.webtoon')
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/hanime/)){
	java.getElements('#list@.grid-item')
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/western/)){
	java.getElements('#western_album@li')
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/asmr/)){
	java.getElements('#asmr_file_list@li')
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/special/)){
	java.getElements('dl@dd@a')
}else{
		java.getElements('#list@li')
}
</js>

<js>

if (p) {
  result = java.getString('source.1@srcset')
} else {
  result = java.getString('img@src');
}
</js>

	book.type = 64;
java.getElements('body')
}else if(result.match(/前后章节列表/)){
	book.type = 64;

	}else if (baseUrl.match(/\/h\//)){
	book.type = 64;

		}else if (baseUrl.match(/anime/)){

		}else if (baseUrl.match(/asmr/)){

		}else if (baseUrl.match(/special/)){

		}else if (baseUrl.match(/hanime/)){

			}else{

	java.getElements('.categorys@dd@a')
	}
</js>
